metadata.title: CVE-2019-11455 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A buffer over-read in Util_urlDecode in util.c in Tildeslash Monit before5.25.3 allows a remote authenticated attacker to retrieve the contents ofadjacent memory via manipulation of GET or POST parameters. The attackercan also cause a denial of service (application outage).

criterions.comment: monit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
